titleStmt.title: A p[i]ndarique elegie upon the death of the R.R. Father in God Jeremy, late Lord Bishop of Doune, Connor, and Dromore by Le. Mathews ...
titleStmt.author: Mathews, Lemuel, fl. 1661-1705.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by John Crook ... and are to be sold by Samuel Dancer ...,

notesStmt.note: Indistinct letter in second word of title.
Reproduction of original in the Cambridge University Library.
